ViewObject.Name: XxcsoQuoteSearch2VO
ViewObject.SQLQuery: SELECT xqh.quote_header_id quote_header_id FROM xxcso_quote_headers xqh ,xxcso_cust_accounts_v xcav WHERE xqh.quote_type = :1 AND xqh.quote_number = :2 AND xqh.quote_revision_number = ( SELECT MAX(xqhs.quote_revision_number) max_qrn FROM xxcso_quote_headers xqhs ,xxcso_cust_accounts_v xcav2 WHERE xqhs.quote_type = :3 AND xqhs.quote_number = :4 AND xqhs.account_number = xcav2.account_number AND ( ( fnd_profile.value('XXCSO1_QUOTE_STANDARD') = '0' AND EXISTS(SELECT '1' FROM xxcso_employees_v2 xev2 ,xxcso_resource_custs_v2 xrcv2 WHERE xev2.user_id = fnd_global.user_id AND xrcv2.employee_number = xev2.employee_number AND xrcv2.account_number = xqhs.account_number ) ) OR ( fnd_profile.value('XXCSO1_QUOTE_STANDARD') = '1' AND ( xqhs.base_code = (SELECT xxcso_util_common_pkg.get_emp_parameter( xev.work_base_code_new ,xev.work_base_code_old ,xev.issue_date ,TRUNC(xxcso_util_common_pkg.get_online_sysdate)) FROM xxcso_employees_v2 xev WHERE xev.user_id = fnd_global.user_id ) OR xcav2.sale_base_code = (SELECT xxcso_util_common_pkg.get_emp_parameter( xev.work_base_code_new ,xev.work_base_code_old ,xev.issue_date ,TRUNC(xxcso_util_common_pkg.get_online_sysdate)) FROM xxcso_employees_v2 xev WHERE xev.user_id = fnd_global.user_id ) ) ) OR ( fnd_profile.value('XXCSO1_QUOTE_STANDARD') = '2' AND ( EXISTS( SELECT '1' FROM xxcso_aff_base_level_v2 xablv2 ,( SELECT xablv.base_code FROM xxcso_aff_base_level_v2 xablv WHERE xablv.child_base_code = ( SELECT xxcso_util_common_pkg.get_emp_parameter( xev.work_base_code_new ,xev.work_base_code_old ,xev.issue_date ,TRUNC(xxcso_util_common_pkg.get_online_sysdate)) FROM xxcso_employees_v2 xev WHERE xev.user_id = fnd_global.user_id ) ) xablv_base WHERE xqhs.base_code = xablv2.child_base_code AND xablv_base.base_code = xablv2.base_code ) OR EXISTS( SELECT '1' FROM xxcso_aff_base_level_v2 xablv2 ,( SELECT xablv.base_code FROM xxcso_aff_base_level_v2 xablv WHERE xablv.child_base_code = ( SELECT xxcso_util_common_pkg.get_emp_parameter( xev.work_base_code_new ,xev.work_base_code_old ,xev.issue_date ,TRUNC(xxcso_util_common_pkg.get_online_sysdate)) FROM xxcso_employees_v2 xev WHERE xev.user_id = fnd_global.user_id ) ) xablv_base WHERE xcav2.sale_base_code = xablv2.child_base_code AND xablv_base.base_code = xablv2.base_code ) ) ) ) ) AND xqh.account_number = xcav.account_number AND ( ( fnd_profile.value('XXCSO1_QUOTE_STANDARD') = '0' AND EXISTS(SELECT '1' FROM xxcso_employees_v2 xev2 ,xxcso_resource_custs_v2 xrcv2 WHERE xev2.user_id = fnd_global.user_id AND xrcv2.employee_number = xev2.employee_number AND xrcv2.account_number = xqh.account_number ) ) OR ( fnd_profile.value('XXCSO1_QUOTE_STANDARD') = '1' AND ( xqh.base_code = (SELECT xxcso_util_common_pkg.get_emp_parameter( xev.work_base_code_new ,xev.work_base_code_old ,xev.issue_date ,TRUNC(xxcso_util_common_pkg.get_online_sysdate)) FROM xxcso_employees_v2 xev WHERE xev.user_id = fnd_global.user_id ) OR xcav.sale_base_code = (SELECT xxcso_util_common_pkg.get_emp_parameter( xev.work_base_code_new ,xev.work_base_code_old ,xev.issue_date ,TRUNC(xxcso_util_common_pkg.get_online_sysdate)) FROM xxcso_employees_v2 xev WHERE xev.user_id = fnd_global.user_id ) ) ) OR ( fnd_profile.value('XXCSO1_QUOTE_STANDARD') = '2' AND ( EXISTS( SELECT '1' FROM xxcso_aff_base_level_v2 xablv2 ,( SELECT xablv.base_code FROM xxcso_aff_base_level_v2 xablv WHERE xablv.child_base_code = ( SELECT xxcso_util_common_pkg.get_emp_parameter( xev.work_base_code_new ,xev.work_base_code_old ,xev.issue_date ,TRUNC(xxcso_util_common_pkg.get_online_sysdate)) FROM xxcso_employees_v2 xev WHERE xev.user_id = fnd_global.user_id ) ) xablv_base WHERE xqh.base_code = xablv2.child_base_code AND xablv_base.base_code = xablv2.base_code ) OR EXISTS( SELECT '1' FROM xxcso_aff_base_level_v2 xablv2 ,( SELECT xablv.base_code FROM xxcso_aff_base_level_v2 xablv WHERE xablv.child_base_code = ( SELECT xxcso_util_common_pkg.get_emp_parameter( xev.work_base_code_new ,xev.work_base_code_old ,xev.issue_date ,TRUNC(xxcso_util_common_pkg.get_online_sysdate)) FROM xxcso_employees_v2 xev WHERE xev.user_id = fnd_global.user_id ) ) xablv_base WHERE xcav.sale_base_code = xablv2.child_base_code AND xablv_base.base_code = xablv2.base_code ) ) ) )
